snippet.title: Tile Tales: Pirate
snippet.description:
Arr matey! Get ready for a new kind of puzzle adventure... the likes of which you've never seen before!

Help our hopelessly treasure obsessed Pirate find his way across a remote island paradise! Solve 90 uniquely handcrafted tile sliding puzzles by guiding him through many trials and tribulations, across 9 engaging chapters, each with their own lush environment to explore. Along the way, he'll encounter interesting characters, daunting obstacles, dangerous foes, and tricky traps! All in an effort to discover the ultimate lost treasure!

May your sails be taut and your coffers be full, matey!

NOW AVAILABLE on mobile devices:
Apple Store: https://apps.apple.com/ie/app/tile-tales-pirate/id6473737087
Google Play: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.ninezyme.slip

COMING SOON for desktop and consoles!
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2983520
